level.heading: DEFINITIONS (ยง 29-4510) For purposes of this Chapter, the following terms shall have the meaningsscribed: Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC) – An entity that meets theefinition set forth in section 1905(1)(2)(B) of the Social Security Act (42.S.C. 1396d(1)(2)(B)). Fiscal Year (FY) – The District’s fiscal year. Increase or decrease in scope of services – A change in the type,ntensity, duration and/or amount of services. A change in the cost of aervice, in and of itself, is not considered a change in the scope of services. Primary care services – Those services defined in section 1842(i)(4) ofhe Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395u(i)(4)). Prospective rate – The rate paid for services furnished in a particulariscal year. The rate is not dependent on actual cost experience during the sameear in which the rate is in effect. Visit – Every patient encounter in an FQHC when one or more medicalervices are furnished to that patient.
